duties_responsibilities.duty: Increase the probability that manufacturing assets will operate when needed by driving company strategies to prevent failures.
Apply analysis techniques to identify and document the causes of failures and eliminate them.
Coordinate proactive reliability-focused activities, including preventative and predictive maintenance.
Support the maintenance engineer and stores with availability simulation and adjusting stocking based on usage and failure analysis.
Perform statistical analysis on machinery failure data to determine adjustments to the maintenance strategy.
Develop testing strategies, operational start-up procedures, and purchase specifications for reliability and maintainability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
